sales-hero.description: Over the past two decades, we have assisted in the purchasing and valuation of over 300 aircraft for corporate and private clients.

personal-manager.title: Personal aviation manager
personal-manager.description: We will provide a personalized aviation manager with extensive experience of over 20 years. He will assist you in determining the most suitable aircraft based on your requirements:
personal-manager.chips: Your plans for using the aircraft; Price expectations; High residual value; Required parameters (range, passengers quantity, based airport); Best profitability

card1.title: Legal department
card1.description: The legal department is committed to ensuring the complete security of the transaction from start to finish. We will prepare the following:
card1.list:
Proposal of intent with guarantees and commitments 
Bank lien verification of the aircraft 
Purchase agreement 
Change of ownership structure in the aircraft registration decision 
Export certificates, airworthiness certificate 
Other necessary documents

card2.title: Finance department
card2.description: We will negotiate on your behalf to secure the most favourable terms. The finance department will select the most appropriate option from the following:
card2.list:
Select the most advantageous tax jurisdiction for the transaction 
Select the most suitable insurance 
Project the cost of ownership 
Calculate the projected rental income

aircraft-descriptor.title: Each aircraft is assessed by a team of mechanics licensed by the manufacturer of the desired aircraft.

card1.title: ABC check verification
card1.description: We review the reports for each ABC check and verify the corrections.

card2.title: Test flight evaluation
card2.description: The technician will conduct a test flight to evaluate the aircraft's performance.

card3.title: Detailed inspection report
card3.description: Once the inspection is complete, we will provide a detailed report on the discrepancies found and the cost of correcting them.

sales-why-us.title: Special management conditions apply to rental from ATM Jet

card1.title: Flights per month
card1.description: We handle over 50 flights per month as a broker.

card2.title: Experienced fleet management
card2.description: We successfully manage over 15 client aircraft as an operator.

card3.title: Market-leading yields
card3.description: We offer the best yields in the market

sales-contact-us.title: Contact us
sales-contact-us.description: Contact us to find out how much yield you can get on your aircraft with us.
